meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>valley</radical> you feel a <radical>lack</radical> of <kanji>want</kanji>. You want for nothing in this valley. It is the valley of plenty.
readingMnemonic: Once you get to the valley, you <kanji>want</kanji> some protein. Egg <reading>yolk</reading> (よく) falls from the sky! It’s a miracle! You wanted protein, and egg yolk was presented. It falls right into your open mouth.
